it.polimi.se2018.controller.network.client

Class CommLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.controller.network.client.CommLayer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommTest.TestCommLayer, RMICommLayer, SocketCommLayer

    abstract class CommLayer
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a generic client network layer
    Author:
    Francesco Franzini

    • Method Detail

      • establishCon

        abstract java.lang.String establishCon(java.lang.String host,
                                       int reqPort,
                                       int objPort,
                                       java.lang.String usn,
                                       java.lang.String pw,
                                       boolean newUser)
        Attempts to establish a connection to the given parameters
        Parameters:
        host - hostname to connect to
        reqPort - port to use for the request socket or RMI port
        objPort - port to use for the object socket, unused if RMI
        usn - username
        pw - password
        newUser - flag to indicate that this is a registration attempt
        Returns:
        null if no errors were raised, a textual representation of the error otherwise

      • endCon

        abstract boolean endCon()
        Attempts to end the current connection
        Returns:
        true if no errors were raised

      • sendOutObj

        abstract boolean sendOutObj(java.io.Serializable obj)
        Sends an object to the server
        Parameters:
        obj - the object to send
        Returns:
        true if no errors were raised

      • sendOutReq

        abstract boolean sendOutReq(AbsReq req)
        Sends a request to the server
        Parameters:
        req - the request to send
        Returns:
        true if no errors were raised

      • receiveInObj

        void receiveInObj(java.io.Serializable obj)
        Pushes a received object to the main client object
        Parameters:
        obj - the object that has been received

      • receiveInReq

        void receiveInReq(AbsReq req)
        Pushes a received request to the main client object
        Parameters:
        req - the request that has been received

      • close

        abstract boolean close()
        Terminates this comm layer
        Returns:
        true if no errors were raised
